name: Anyone home?
description: Your SOC team received an alert about malicious behaviour coming from IP 172.20.0.46

tasks.name: Is Anyone Home?
tasks.description: Analyze the malicious behaviour and discover a flag.

tasks.name: Bonus: Uno Reverse Card
tasks.description: Paradoxically, attackers do not care about their own security. Give them a taste of their own medicine and discover a flag.
